de.jcommandlineparser
Class DoubleOption

java.lang.Object
  de.jcommandlineparser.AbstractOption<java.lang.Double>
      de.jcommandlineparser.DoubleOption

public class DoubleOption
extends AbstractOption<java.lang.Double>

DoubleOption represents an program option of type double.

--d=1.0, -d=3.14
would be such a double program option.

Author:
bananenkasper
